docs.snippet: The American Republics liner Brazil docked here at 8:46 A.M. yesterday after a record-breaking run from Buenos Aires. She made the trip in fourteen days and twelve hours, probably the fastest time for a passenger liner.
docs.lead_paragraph: The American Republics liner Brazil docked here at 8:46 A.M. yesterday after a record-breaking run from Buenos Aires. She made the trip in fourteen days and twelve hours, probably the fastest time for a passenger liner.
docs.abstract: Arrives, N Y C; makes run from Buenos Aires in record time
